title: Flutter Developer - Immediate Joiner
jobDescription:
We are looking for a functionally skilled person who can manage several projects and deliver robust solutions.


Job Responsibilities:


  • A clear understanding of the application development life cycle.
  • Experience in Flutter development
  • Good understanding of architecture patterns, design principles, interface guidelines and best practices.
  • Experience in VIPER, MVC & MVVM
  • Experience in Flutter as Cross Platform Application Development
  • Experience in Github & jira
  • Analyze requirements and implement them into an application.
  • Good understanding of native iOS frameworks.
  • Develop advanced native applications for the iOS platform using Swift and Objective-C.
  • Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services.
  • Ability to communicate technical concepts clearly and effectively.
  • Good Skill in UI Design is Mandatory.
  • Design and build applications for the iOS platform for iPhone & iPad.
  • Should be familiar with responsive design for iPhone & iPad
  • Experience working with A/B testing, Event frameworks will be a plus.
  • Ensure the performance, quality, security, and responsiveness of applications.
  • Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
  • Translate designs and wire-frames into high-quality code.
  • Design, build, and maintain high-performance, reusable, and reliable.
  • Complete day-to-day tasks and update on Jira or Backlog, and write documentation on Confluence or GitHub if needed.
  • Collaborate with the Android team, the Web(back-end/fronted) team, and the QA team for the day-to-day tasks.
  • Help maintain code quality, organization, and automation.

Experience Required: 5 - 8 yrs



Area of Expertise

  • Swift & SwiftUI (must have worked on 3-4 Projects with responsive design for Iphone & Ipad)
  • Flutter (must have worked on 1-2 Projects)
  • Objective-C
  • Software Development
  • Mobile App Development
  • iOS Application Development

  • Troubleshooting application and code issues.

  • Responding to integration requests from front-end developers.

  • Updating and altering application features to enhance performance.
  • Keep abreast of new trends and best practices in web development.
PHP Developer Requirements:

title: Senior ASP.Net Developer
jobDescription:
As a Senior Software Engineer (ASP .NET MVC), you will be a part of our product-based segment, and involved in the development of our flagship streaming web application.

You will also have the opportunity to work on a diverse range of domain-specific Web Applications with varying requirements from our client. Were looking for a motivated self-starter who enjoys working with small but committed teams, while developing industry-leading products that utilize the absolute latest in cutting edge technology. A goal-oriented and problem-solving mindset is what were after.

Roles and responsibilities:
  • Development of our flagship Live Streaming web application
  • Making changes to existing web applications according to the feedback received from the end users or clients.
  • Analyze system requirements and prioritize tasks.
  • Write clean, testable code using .NET programming languages
  • Develop technical specifications and architecture
  • Test and debug various .NET applications
  • Review and refactor code
  • Deploy fully functional applications
  • Upgrade existing programs
  • Conceptualizing and Implementing new features and functionality
  • Maintenance of our multi-tenanted web application
  • Developing Core Business Functionality
Key Skills

ASP .NET MVC 5 Framework JavaScript/jQuery MS SQL Server Front-End Technologies (HTML5/CSS3) Comfortable with Source Control and Version Management tools

B.Tech/B.E. in Computers, B.Sc in Computers

title: Senior Android Developer
jobDescription:
In this role, you have an opportunity for significant impact through your ability to increase developer efficiency and product quality through your work. You will play an impactful role to build mobile-first experiences Apps.

Roles and responsibilities:
  • Collaborate with Product Managers, Designers and Backend Engineers to design and deliver high-quality products on Android
  • Build end-to-end features of the app: networking, persistence, business logic, and UI
  • Build efficient and reusable mobile components and architect reliable and scalable mobile solutions
  • Identify areas of improvement and advocate for mobile best practices
  • Analyze and optimize UI and infrastructure application code for quality, efficiency, and performance
Key Skills

Languages: Java / Kotlin Architecture: MVVM Network: Retrofit, Okhttp, Protocol buffers Dependency Injection: Dagger 2 CI/CD: Jenkins Other: Android JetPack, Glide, Git, ExoPlayer.

B.Tech/B.E. in Computers, B.Sc in Computers
